alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 03 at 9:27AM CST until March 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1000 AM CST. * At 927 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Mantachie, or near Fulton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Sandy Springs and Fairview around 935 AM CST. Belmont around 950 AM CST. Tishomingo State Park around 955 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Eastman, Mingo, Dennis, Moores Mill, Bloody Springs, Petertown, Neil and Golden. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
